values: 玩；玩耍；参与（体育运动）；担当；扮演（角色）；演奏（乐器）；上演（戏剧）；播放（音乐或视频）；操作；运行；起作用；晃动；游移；耍花招；开玩笑；戏弄；（液体、光线等）流动；闪烁；（机器部件之间）有松动；踢；击（球）；走（子）；出牌
游戏；比赛；活动；玩耍；剧本；戏剧；娱乐；剧本；（音频或图像的）播放次数；播放时长；比赛中的表现；比赛中的动作

演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛

运动员，比赛者；游戏者，做游戏的人；演奏者，表演者；演员

办事公道, 为人诚实

bilingual.source: And I should like so much to play.
Lots of people play at the park.

bilingual.target: 我们会聊天、玩耍和唱歌。

bilingual.source: Let's eat moon cakes and let's play!
bilingual.target: 让我们吃月饼并玩耍吧！

bilingual.source: We eat, we sleep, we work and we play.
bilingual.target: 我们吃饭，睡觉，工作和玩耍。

bilingual.source: I'll swim and play in the cleanest sea!
bilingual.target: 我会在最干净的海里游泳和玩耍！
班级，钟，盘子，茄子，清洁，玩耍。

bilingual.source: I wash, feed and play with them every day.
bilingual.target: 我每天给它们洗澡、喂食并和它们玩耍。

list.abstract: play（英 [pleɪ]，美 [pleɪ]），英语单词，作名词为玩；玩耍；玩乐。作动词为玩；玩耍；参加。短语搭配有play a role in（扮演角色）。例句为“It can even play the guitar.（它甚至可以弹吉他。）” play及物动词类近义词有sport、broadcast等，相关反义词有tightness。
《PLAY》是S.H.E在2007年5月11日发行的专辑。专辑取名为《PLAY》其实有两个涵意。一就是“玩音乐”，因为这次S.H.E与两岸音乐人玩出全新音乐风，充份地发挥了“玩乐”精神；另外就是“放音乐”，也就是大家最熟悉的收音机上面的PLAY键，希望大家按下PLAY键，不断让音乐PLAY下去。

yingyinNormal.en: George is going to play in the wet grass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治将要去湿草坪上玩耍。

yingyinNormal.en: We had the wrong kind of soil for flowers. Oh. And anyway, you needed somewhere to play. You and Suzy loved to play in the garden.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们把种花的土壤搞错了。哦。不管怎么说，你需要一些玩耍的地方。你和苏西喜欢在花园里玩耍。

yingyinNormal.en: Three little kittens loved to play, they had fun in the sun all day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 3只小猫爱玩耍 太阳下玩了一整天

yingyinNormal.en: So, with prosthetics, he learned to walk and run and play again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 借助修复术，他又重新学会了行走，奔跑与玩耍。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, dear. Peppa loves playing in the wet grass, but she doesn't want to get her new shoes wet. I can't play in the wet grass, George. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，天哪。佩佩喜欢在湿草坪上玩耍，但是她不想把她的新鞋弄湿。我不能在湿草坪上玩耍，乔治。噢。

yingyinNormal.en: But these toddlers, they don't know how to play with us. They're too young. And they're sticky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这些小屁孩，他们不知道该如何玩耍我们，他们太小了而且难缠。

yingyinNormal.en: Under the protection of Mighty Eagle, we work, we play, we laugh, we love, and we live our lives free from conflict and strife, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在无敌神鹰的庇护下，我们劳动，玩耍，欢笑，我们热爱并享受这种与世无争的生活。

yingyinNormal.en: Lovely, and later we will sing that for your mommies and daddies. It is playtime. Enjoy yourselves. Play nicely together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 唱的真好，等一下呢，我们还要为你们的爸爸妈妈演唱这首歌呢。玩耍的时间到了。希望你们玩的开心，玩的友好一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on! Let’s play! Yes, let’s play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快来！我们一起玩！好，我们一起玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on. Let's play. Yes, let's play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧！我们来玩吧！好的，我们来玩吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Based on this play? Based on this play!
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这场戏？因为这一场戏！

yingyinNormal.en: You're play is the next play. I'm gonna see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我接下来将去看你的戏。

yingyinNormal.en: We can both play this game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要斗嘴谁怕谁。

yingyinNormal.en: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play
yingyinNormal.zh: 理查德兔子来玩

yingyinNormal.en: My kid's in a play right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的小孩现在正在表演话剧。

yingyinNormal.en: We used to play tag and stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们常常玩捉迷藏和其他游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: No, women are welcome to play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不啊，女生也欢迎加人。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what... Oh, my God, play.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意思是… 上帝啊，你就弹吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I used to love to play restaurant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以前最喜欢玩开餐厅的游戏了。

yingyinNormal.en: That's where I'll play the bad cop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这时我就唱白脸。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 发挥作用；扮演角色；起到作用
对规则的恪守；公平待遇；公道

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 剧场；戏院；玩具屋
n. 比赛；演奏

word_family.mean: v. 玩；玩耍；参加；合作；买某人的账；扮演；演奏；移动；显现；消逝；晃动；摇曳；变幻；让…挣扎得筋疲力尽

examination_example.sentence: Only recently have they come to see the vital part forests will have to <highlight>play</highlight> in storing carbon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到最近，他们才开始意识到森林将在碳储存方面必须发挥重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: That message did not <highlight>play</highlight> well with many in Iowa, where wind turbines dot the fields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对爱荷华州的许多人来说，那个说法并不奏效，在该州，风力涡轮机遍布田野。

examination_example.sentence: He expects the board to "<highlight>play</highlight> primarily an advisory role."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他期望该委员会“主要发挥顾问作用”。

sense_info_list.en: perform an entertainment or a particular character
sense_info_list.zh: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

examination_example.sentence: To realize how great was the dramatic activity, we must remember further that hosts of <highlight>plays</highlight> have been lost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要明白当时的戏剧活动是何等繁荣，我们还必须记住，大量剧作都已散失。

examination_example.sentence: I remember that the musical <highlight>play</highlight> Hair opened on Broadway on the same day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我记得，当天音乐剧《毛发》在百老汇首演。

examination_example.sentence: Miranda Priestly, <highlight>played</highlight> by Meryl Streep, scolds her assistant for imagining that high fashion doesn't affect her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由梅丽尔•斯特里普饰演的米兰达•普利斯特里，斥责其女助手，因为（这位女助手）认为高端时装对她自身并没有影响。

examination_example.sentence: The rats may have bonded more with the social robot because it displayed behaviors like communal exploring and <highlight>playing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 真鼠可能与社交机械鼠产生更亲密的联系，因为它（社交机械鼠）表现出如共同探索和玩耍等行为。

examination_example.sentence: "Tech is designed to really suck you in," says Jenny Radesky in her study of digital <highlight>play</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “科技旨在让你沉迷其中”，詹妮·拉德斯基在她的数字游戏研究中说道。

examination_example.sentence: Most importantly, it constantly modifies and enhances the games you <highlight>play</highlight> to build on the strengths you are developing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是，它不断调整和改进你玩的游戏项目，以强化你正在发展的优势。

examination_example.sentence: Progressives often support diversity mandates as a path to equality and a way to level the <highlight>playing</highlight> field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进步人士往往支持多元化规定，将其当做是通向平等的道路和创造公平竞争环境的途径。

examination_example.sentence: Retail trade groups praised the ruling, saying it levels the <highlight>playing</highlight> field for local and online businesses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零售业集团称赞这一裁决，称其为本地和在线业务提供了公平的竞争环境。

examination_example.sentence: The rule limited states' ability to seek long-term prosperity and has prevented market participants from competing on an even <highlight>playing</highlight> field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一规定限制了国家寻求长期繁荣的能力，并阻止了市场参与者在一个公平的竞争环境中竞争。

examination_example.sentence: There is space for <highlight>playing</highlight> fields and the money to pave tennis and netball courts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有场地用作运动场，也有资金用于铺设网球场和无挡板篮球场。

examination_example.sentence: Officials must not be allowed to <highlight>play</highlight> favorites in providing information or in arranging meetings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员不得在提供信息或安排接见时有所偏袒。

examination_example.sentence: Well-enforced laws in government transparency are needed to guarantee fair <highlight>play</highlight> in official access.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要在政府透明度方面执行良好的法律法规，来保证在官员接见上的公平。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a game or other organized activity
hit or kick a ball in a game
behave or pretend in a particular way, especially in order to produce a particular effect or result
perform music on an instrument or instruments

exam_freq_info.chinese: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 弹钢琴；弹奏钢琴；演奏钢琴

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 爱玩耍的；嬉戏的；轻松的；无忧无虑的；开玩笑的；欢快的；闹着玩的；不当真的；愉悦的
n. 运动场；操场；游乐场；活动场所
n. 剧场；戏院；玩具屋
n. 玩具；玩物；玩偶
n. 运动员；演奏者，乐手；演员；（Player）人名：普莱耶

word_family.mean: v. 玩；玩耍；参加；合作；买某人的账；扮演；演奏；移动；显现；消逝；晃动；摇曳；变幻；让…挣扎得筋疲力尽

sense_info_list.en: perform an entertainment or a particular character
sense_info_list.zh: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

examination_example.sentence: But the primary benefit is usually the passion and excitement associated with <highlight>playing</highlight> a role in a promising new company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过主要的好处通常在于，在一家有前途的新创公司任职会带来激情与兴奋。

examination_example.sentence: Unwillingness to allow them to <highlight>play</highlight> with toys.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不愿意让他们玩玩具。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Playing</highlight> cards was on the agenda, as well as learning to play mahjong (麻将).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 扑克牌已列入日程，同时也要学习打麻将。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Playing</highlight> pool, <highlight>playing</highlight> cards, having dinner, having lunch, all work better than going through a survey of questions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玩台球，打牌，吃晚饭，吃午餐比进行问题调查要好得多。

sense_info_list.en: perform music on an instrument or instruments

examination_example.sentence: If children who <highlight>play</highlight> the piano are smarter, it doesn't necessarily mean they are smarter because they <highlight>play</highlight> the piano.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果弹钢琴的孩子更聪明，并不一定意味着他们因为弹钢琴而更聪明。

examination_example.sentence: The youngsters who <highlight>play</highlight> the piano also happen to be more ambitious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弹钢琴的年轻人也恰巧更有野心。

examination_example.sentence: When a child learns to <highlight>play</highlight> the violin, several studies have shown that the brain region is likely to grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当孩子学习拉小提琴时，多项研究表明大脑区域可能会增长。

examination_example.sentence: Creating labels that <highlight>play</highlight> on consumer fears and misconceptions about their food may give a company a temporary marketing advantage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利用消费者对食品的恐惧和误解来创建标签，可能会给公司带来暂时的营销优势。

sense_info_list.en: hit or kick a ball in a game

word_usage.usage: 当play作“演奏”解时，不用于打击乐器(如锣、鼓等)。一般表示“敲锣”，“击鼓”可以用动词“beat”表示，如：beat a drum/gong
play后接表示球类或牌等名词时，其前不加冠词the，如：play basketball; 而接乐器时则须加冠词the，如：play the guitar（在美式英语中the有时也可以省略）。

在现代英语中， play用作不及物动词表示“玩”时，几乎只能用于儿童、动物或用于玩笑口吻中。不可把汉语“玩”一律译成play。
示例： 那天晚上他们玩得开心极了。
误 That evening they played very happily.
正 They had a very good time that evening.
正 They enjoyed themselves that evening.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 对…轻描淡写；淡化；贬低；低估
adj. 爱玩耍的；嬉戏的；轻松的；无忧无虑的；开玩笑的；欢快的；闹着玩的；不当真的；愉悦的
n. 运动场；操场；游乐场；活动场所
n. 运动员；演奏者，乐手；演员；（Player）人名：普莱耶
v. 重放；重赛；重演；重现

word_family.mean: v. 玩；玩耍；参加；合作；买某人的账；扮演；演奏；移动；显现；消逝；晃动；摇曳；变幻；让…挣扎得筋疲力尽

examination_example.sentence: According to a pediatrician, no matter what kind of <highlight>play</highlight> children engage in, they are learning how to create things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据一位儿科医生说，不管孩子玩什么游戏，他们都在学习如何创造东西。

examination_example.sentence: Between 1981 and 1997, detailed time-use studies showed that the time children spent at <highlight>play</highlight> declined by 25 percent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1981年至1997年间，详细的时间使用研究显示，儿童玩耍的时间减少了25%。

examination_example.sentence: The suggestion of letting children simply <highlight>play</highlight> may sound like going backwards to parents who want to help build their children's skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于那些想要帮助孩子们培养技能的父母，仅仅让孩子们的玩耍的建议听起来就像是倒退。

sense_info_list.en: perform an entertainment or a particular character
sense_info_list.zh: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

examination_example.sentence: "We realize that as a company with people, trucks, warehouses, we needed to <highlight>play</highlight> a larger role," said Eduardo Martinez, the president of the UPS Foundation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联合包裹基金会主席爱德华多马丁内斯说：“我们意识到，作为一家拥有人员、卡车、仓库的公司，我们需要发挥更大的作用。”

examination_example.sentence: An individual's genetics has a big influence on their height, but once you average over whole populations, genetics <highlight>plays</highlight> a less key role.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗传因素对个体身高影响很大，但计算所有人口的平均身高时，遗传基因对身高的作用就不那么重要了。

examination_example.sentence: We want people to understand what they're eating, how to prepare it, the role food <highlight>plays</highlight> in their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望人们了解他们正在吃什么，如何准备它们，以及食物在他们的生活中扮演的角色。

sense_info_list.en: perform music on an instrument or instruments

examination_example.sentence: Maybe we should ask Paul to bring his computer and speakers, so that we can <highlight>play</highlight> some music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许我们应该让保罗带上他的电脑和扬声器，这样我们就可以播放一些音乐。

examination_example.sentence: They are able to bring their potential into fuller <highlight>play</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们能够更加最大程度地发挥自己的潜力。

examination_example.sentence: We do demanding work that brings our capacity into full <highlight>play</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们做的工作要求很高，能充分发挥我们的能力。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a game or other organized activity

examination_example.sentence: And the <highlight>playing</highlight> field is nothing close to level.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且比赛环境也不公平。

sense_info_list.en: hit or kick a ball in a game
behave or pretend in a particular way; especially in order to produce a particular effect or result

word_usage.usage: play后接表示球类或牌等名词时，其前不加冠词the，如：play basketball; 而接乐器时则须加冠词the，如：play the guitar（在美式英语中the有时也可以省略）。
当play作“演奏”解时，不用于打击乐器(如锣、鼓等)。一般表示“敲锣”，“击鼓”可以用动词“beat”表示，如：beat a drum/gong

在现代英语中， play用作不及物动词表示“玩”时，几乎只能用于儿童、动物或用于玩笑口吻中。不可把汉语“玩”一律译成play。
示例： 那天晚上他们玩得开心极了。
误 That evening they played very happily.
正 They had a very good time that evening.
正 They enjoyed themselves that evening.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 弹钢琴；弹奏钢琴；演奏钢琴
玩国际象棋；下国际象棋；下西洋棋
做运动；玩体育游戏；体育活动
以特定方式发展；发生；出现

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 运动场；操场；游乐场；活动场所
n. 剧场；戏院；玩具屋
n. 运动员；演奏者，乐手；演员；（Player）人名：普莱耶

word_family.mean: v. 玩；玩耍；参加；合作；买某人的账；扮演；演奏；移动；显现；消逝；晃动；摇曳；变幻；让…挣扎得筋疲力尽

examination_example.sentence: Then what about <highlight>playing</highlight> a computer game?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么玩电脑游戏怎么样？

examination_example.sentence: Yeah, he loves to have other kids to <highlight>play</highlight> with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是啊，他喜欢和其他孩子一起玩。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Playing</highlight> a computer game.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玩电脑游戏。

examination_example.sentence: He likes reading short <highlight>plays</highlight> to others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他喜欢给别人读短剧。

examination_example.sentence: To get the most out of reading these <highlight>plays</highlight>, try to picture the play on stage, with you, the reader, in the audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了从阅读这些戏剧中获得最大的收获，试着想象戏剧在舞台上的情景，而你，读者，和观众在一起。

examination_example.sentence: To do this I have searched through dozens of <highlight>plays</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了做到这一点，我搜索了几十个剧本。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Playing</highlight> football well is cool because I can show how strong I am.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 踢好足球很酷，因为我可以展示我有多强。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>played</highlight> aggressively and even scored a goal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们踢得很有侵略性，甚至还进了一球。

examination_example.sentence: My daughter <highlight>plays</highlight> on a recreational soccer team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我女儿在一个业余足球队踢球。

examination_example.sentence: Today, I'd like to focus my comments on the meaningful roles the elderly can <highlight>play</highlight> and should <highlight>play</highlight> in our society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，我想重点谈谈老年人在社会中所能扮演的和应该扮演的有意义的角色。

examination_example.sentence: They say it can <highlight>play</highlight> a big role in calming the brain enough to sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们说，它可以在使大脑平静到足以入睡方面发挥重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: Today, they are once again a familiar sight, <highlight>playing</highlight> roles that are often just as important for the community as their original purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天，它们再次成为人们熟悉的景象，扮演着与它们最初的目的一样重要的角色。

examination_example.sentence: He said he became just as nervous as those <highlight>playing</highlight> instruments on stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说，他就像舞台上演奏乐器的人一样紧张。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Playing</highlight> the piano is cool because it can give me joy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弹钢琴很酷，因为它能给我快乐。

examination_example.sentence: The Orchestra <highlight>plays</highlight> at Memorial Hall at 1406 Elm Street, which offers several concerts from March through June.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乐团在1406Elm街的纪念堂演奏，从3月到6月这里会举办几场音乐会。

examination_example.sentence: Just keep music <highlight>playing</highlight> throughout.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让音乐一直播放。

examination_example.sentence: I enjoyed studying different kinds of cars and planes, <highlight>playing</highlight> pop music, and collecting the latest music albums.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喜欢研究各种各样的汽车和飞机、播放流行音乐以及收集最新的音乐专辑。

examination_example.sentence: They rose in the ranks not by being friendly but by smoking cigarettes, breaking rules and <highlight>playing</highlight> jokes on others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在（学生）地位中上升，方式不是通过待人友善而是通过吸烟、违反规则和嘲弄别人。

examination_example.sentence: It struck me that <highlight>playing</highlight> against the other team was a great learning moment for all the girls on the team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我突然意识到，对队里所有的女孩来说，与另一个队比赛是一个很好的学习机会。

examination_example.sentence: This led to some painful experiences on Saturday as they <highlight>played</highlight> against teams better trained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这给他们在周六的比赛中带来了一些痛苦的经历，因为他们的对手是训练更好的球队。

examination_example.sentence: He focused on <highlight>playing</highlight> dramatic roles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他专注于扮演戏剧角色。

examination_example.sentence: We were respectful of craft (技艺) and focused on digging into the characters we were going to <highlight>play</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们尊重技艺，专注于挖掘我们要扮演的角色。

examination_example.sentence: We will have a report on the present state of <highlight>play</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将有一份关于目前事态的报告。

examination_example.sentence: Things would have <highlight>played</highlight> out so differently if I had simply said, "No, we really don't have money to give more. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我当时只是简单地说：“不，我们真的没有钱再捐了。”事情就会完全不同了。

word_usage.usage: play后的球类名词不用the：play football 踢足球

exam_freq_info.chinese: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 开玩笑地；好游玩地
adj. 爱玩耍的；嬉戏的；轻松的；无忧无虑的；开玩笑的；欢快的；闹着玩的；不当真的；愉悦的
n. 运动场；操场；游乐场；活动场所
n. 运动员；演奏者，乐手；演员；（Player）人名：普莱耶
n. 比赛；演奏

word_family.mean: v. 玩；玩耍；参加；合作；买某人的账；扮演；演奏；移动；显现；消逝；晃动；摇曳；变幻；让…挣扎得筋疲力尽

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 弹钢琴；弹奏钢琴；演奏钢琴
发挥作用；扮演角色；起到作用
玩国际象棋；下国际象棋；下西洋棋
扮演一个角色；发挥作用；起作用
做运动；玩体育游戏；体育活动
打网球；打打网球；玩网球
播放音乐；演奏音乐；玩音乐
拉小提琴；演奏小提琴；弹小提琴

examination_example.sentence: Most of the children in my time liked to <highlight>play</highlight> together under that big tree, especially during the summer holidays.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我生活的那个时代，尤其是暑假的时候，大多数孩子都喜欢在那棵大树下一起玩耍。

examination_example.sentence: For example, why do you like to <highlight>play</highlight> with cats more than dogs?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比如，为什么比起狗，你更喜欢和猫一起玩？

examination_example.sentence: Every time she saw other children <highlight>play</highlight> happily outside, Liu Yanzhi really wanted to join them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次看到其他孩子在外面开心地玩耍，Liu Yanzhi都很想加入他们。

sense_info_list.en: take part in a game or other organized activity

examination_example.sentence: Hyun was a cool kid and good at <highlight>playing</highlight> basketball.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hyun是个很酷的孩子，并且擅长打篮球。

examination_example.sentence: "I don't want to <highlight>play</highlight> chess," Cindy replied.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我不想下棋，”辛迪回答说。

examination_example.sentence: I often <highlight>play</highlight> basketball with him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我经常跟他一起打篮球。

sense_info_list.en: perform music on an instrument or instruments

examination_example.sentence: Frank, you can <highlight>play</highlight> the violin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗兰克，你会拉小提琴。

examination_example.sentence: Sue practises <highlight>playing</highlight> the violin hard and often gives wonderful performances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苏努力练习拉小提琴并且经常会有精彩的表现。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>plays</highlight> a new record of the pop songs and modem music for his listeners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他为听众播放流行歌曲和现代音乐的新唱片。

sense_info_list.en: perform an entertainment or a particular character
sense_info_list.zh: 扮演; 演出; 戏剧

examination_example.sentence: Last week, some students put on an English <highlight>play</highlight> at Rosie Bridge School.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，一些学生在 Rosie Bridge 学校上演了一部英语剧。

examination_example.sentence: The closest thing to watching a film during ancient times was going to see a shadow <highlight>play</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在古代，最接近看电影的事情就是看皮影戏。

examination_example.sentence: a modern <highlight>play</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一部现代剧

examination_example.sentence: Everyone should <highlight>play</highlight> a part in keeping it clean and tidy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都应该在保持干净整洁方面发挥作用。

examination_example.sentence: Hazel's agent has <highlight>played</highlight> a role in her success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hazel 的经纪人在她的成功中发挥了作用。

examination_example.sentence: They allowed their imaginations to <highlight>play</highlight> an important part in their work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们让自己的想象力在他们的工作中发挥重要作用。

word_usage.usage: 当play作“演奏”解时，不用于打击乐器(如锣、鼓等)。一般表示“敲锣”，“击鼓”可以用动词“beat”表示，如：beat a drum/gong
play后接表示球类或牌等名词时，其前不加冠词the，如：play basketball; 而接乐器时则须加冠词the，如：play the guitar（在美式英语中the有时也可以省略）。

在现代英语中， play用作不及物动词表示“玩”时，几乎只能用于儿童、动物或用于玩笑口吻中。不可把汉语“玩”一律译成play。
示例： 那天晚上他们玩得开心极了。
误 That evening they played very happily.
正 They had a very good time that evening.
正 They enjoyed themselves that evening.
